Override Generic Dialogue.Description: Overwrites the bouquet acceptance dialogue. Please turn this off if you do not plan on dating Chrissy.

Entries.Chrissy.Seanie: This is incredible! I wanna slurp yah! $6/-5 305 272 306 307 308 807/Wow, you're actually not a complete moron. This is pretty neat. $1//This is cringe. $2//This reminds me of the time my little brother drank a candle, are you as thick as him? $2/-4/I AM THE LORD OF DARKNESS. $8//

Entries.ChrissyMail.SecretWoods: Hi @,^I want to explain everything, so please meet me in the secret forest at noon. I promise I'm a good person.^^Thanks.^-Chrissy[#]Meet Me in the Woods
Entries.ChrissyMail.Picnic: Hey @,^Next Tuesday, come to the Cindersnap Forest. I want to do something special for all that you've done for me.^^And don't forget to bring your juicy bottom.^^-Chrissy[#]@.
Entries.ChrissyMail.MagicShow: Dear @,^I've decided to host a magic show in town, and everyone is invited. It would mean the world to me if you came.^I cannot wait to see you.^^You know what I mean. Don't make me say it to your face, you moron.^^-Chrissy[#]You better be there!

Entries.NPC.cs.3962: Really @? $4#$b# I've felt this way since the day I met you $4#$b# I thought my chances were over when we became best friends.$4#$e# I'm so giddy...I feel like such a moron $4#$e# Go away! I'm too embarrassed to talk to you right now, you moron. $4
Entries.NPC.cs.3963: Really @? $4#$b# I've felt this way since the day I met you $4#$b# I thought my chances were over when we became best friends.$4#$e# I'm so giddy...I feel like such a moron $4#$e# Go away! I'm too embarrassed to talk to you right now, you moron. $4
Entries.NPC.cs.3980: Ar- Are you serious @?” $1#$b# Of course, I'll marry you! $1

Entries.Chrissy.Seanie0: MARRIAGE IS AWESOME. I CANNOT WAIT. $4#$e# FOREVER LOVE.$1
Entries.Chrissy.Seanie1: I seriously can't believe I'm so lucky. $4#$e# Back on my home planet, we don't do weddings, so I never thought this would happen to me! $4

Entries.Chrissy.Seanie: I love rainy days. $1#$e# Just the sound of the drops hitting the window soothes me. $1#$b# I'm not going soft, I just like the sky water! $4

Entries.Sun6: I hope I can talk to my uncle again soon. $3
Entries.Mon6: Things have been really awkward back at my house lately. $2

Entries.Chrissy.Seanie: I love rainy days almost as much as I love you $1

Entries.1769800/f Chrissy.Seanie 500/d Mon Wed T: continue/-1000 -1000/farmer 70 37 2 Chrissy.Seanie 70 46 2/skippable/specificTemporarySprite pennyFieldTrip/showframe Chrissy.Seanie 16/fade/viewport 70 45 true/move farmer 0 5 2/stopMusic/emote Chrissy.Seanie 56/playMusic poppy/speak Chrissy.Seanie "It's a Sunny Day, $8 #$b#I hope it stays that Way, $8#$b#My hair's just a little gray, $8 #$b#I just got a raise, $8 #$b#And I'm deserving of some praise, $8 #$b#So today we eat some mayonnaise, $8"/animate Chrissy.Seanie false false 200 16 17 18 19 18 19 18 19 18/playSound gulp/message "Chrissy.Seanie brings the jar of mayonnaise to her mouth, and chugs it, in one gulp!"/showframe Chrissy.Seanie 0/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Mayonnaise Monday, $8#$b#It's Mayonnaise Monday! $8"/message "Chrissy.Seanie grabs a second jar of mayonnaise"/showframe Chrissy.Seanie 16/stopMusic/question fork0 "What should you do?#I can't let this go on any longer.#I'll just leave her alone.#"/fork MayoTime/move farmer -12 0 1/end warpOut/
Entries.MayoTime: move farmer 0 3 2/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 0/speak Chrissy.Seanie "@, what are you doing here?$2#$b#I swear, it's not what it looks like. This isn't a normal thing I do. $3#$b# It- It's a family tradition. I- I know it's a little weird, but my brother started it when we were kids. When I miss him, I have my Mayonnaise Mondays.$3"/question fork1 "You don't think it's weird right?#I get it. I miss my family sometimes too.#I'm not sure I can be your friend anymore.#"/fork MayoTime2/speak Chrissy.Seanie "I completely understand. $3"/friendship Chrissy.Seanie -20/move farmer 0 -12 0 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.MayoTime2: friendship Chrissy.Seanie 50/playMusic ragtime/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Really? I knew you were cool @.$1#$b# Please just don't tell anybody about this?$4#$b#Especially not Uncle Lew.$7#$b# I'm glad it was someone like you who found me. $7"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Mayonnaise Monday.$8"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Chrissy.Seanie "Thanks for keeping my secret $1#$b# I owe you one. $6#$b#I'll see if I can find any 'additional tax write offs' for you this spring."

Entries.1769800/f Chrissy.Seanie 500/d Mon Wed T: continue/-1000 -1000/farmer 70 37 2 Chrissy.Seanie 70 46 2/skippable/specificTemporarySprite pennyFieldTrip/showframe Chrissy.Seanie 16/addObject 71 45 306/fade/viewport 70 45 true/move farmer 0 5 2/stopMusic/pause 200/emote farmer 8/pause 500/emote Chrissy.Seanie 56/playMusic poppy/pause 500/speak Chrissy.Seanie "It's a Sunny Day, $8 #$b#I hope it stays that Way, $8#$b#My hair's just a little gray, $8 #$b#I just got a raise, $8 #$b#And I'm deserving of some praise, $8 #$b#So today we eat some mayonnaise, $8"/animate Chrissy.Seanie false false 200 16 17 18 19 18 19 18 19 18/pause 300/playSound gulp/pause 300/playSound gulp/pause 300/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/showframe Chrissy.Seanie 0/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Mayonnaise Monday, $8#$b#It's Mayonnaise Monday! $8"/pause 500/pause 400/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 1/pause 200/playSound pickUpItem/removeObject 71 45 306/pause 500/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 2 true/showframe Chrissy.Seanie 16/emote Chrissy.Seanie 56/pause 300/stopMusic/emote farmer 12/pause 500/question fork0 "What should you do?#I can't let this go on any longer.#I'll just leave her alone.#"/fork MayoTime1/move farmer -12 0 1/end warpOut/

This isn't a normal thing I do. $3#$b#It- It's a family tradition. I- I know it's a little weird, but my brother started it when we were kids. When I miss him, I have my Mayonnaise Mondays.$3"/pause 500/question fork1 "You don't think it's weird right?#I get it. I miss my family sometimes too.#I'm not sure I can be your friend anymore.#"/fork MayoTime21/emote Chrissy.Seanie 28/pause 300/speak Chrissy.Seanie "I completely understand. $3"/friendship Chrissy.Seanie -20/move farmer 0 -12 0 true/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
Entries.MayoTime21: pause 200/friendship Chrissy.Seanie 50/emote Chrissy.Seanie 32/pause 500/playMusic ragtime/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Really? I knew you were cool @.$1#$b# Please just don't tell anybody about this?$4#$b#Especially not Uncle Lew.$7#$b# I'm glad it was someone like you who found me. $7"/pause 300/emote farmer 32/pause 500/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Mayonnaise Monday.$8"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Chrissy.Seanie "Thanks for keeping my secret $1#$b# I owe you one. $6#$b# I'll see if I can find any 'additional tax write offs' for you this spring."

Entries.1769801/f Chrissy.Seanie 1000/t 900 2100: continue/42 72/farmer 35 73 3 Chrissy.Seanie 43 72 0 Vincent 42 72 1/skippable/pause 1500/speak Vincent "Hey lady, I'm bored. $0"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Good to know. $2"/speak Vincent "Can you do something funny? $0"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Why don't you ask your burnout brother? $2"/speak Vincent "C'mon pleeeeeeease. $3"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "No. $2"/speak Vincent "Pleeeeeeeease?"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "OKAY FINE! $5"/stopMusic/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 3/move farmer 7 0 0 true/pause 500/emote farmer 8/waitForAllStationary/pause 800/playSound newRecipe/message "Chrissy begins shuffling cards"/playMusic playful/speak Vincent "What are you doing? $3"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "I'm gonna do a magic trick. $2#$b# Pick a card from the top of the deck."/playSound pickUpItem/message "Vincent picks a card and stares at it."/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Okay, memorize that card."/speak Vincent "Right!"/emote Vincent 16/pause 400/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Okay, got it? Now put it back in the deck wherever you want."/playSound dwop/message "Vincent puts the card back."/message "Chrissy.Seanie proceeds to shuffle the deck several times, and then throws whole the deck of cards onto the floor."/playSound dwoop/message "She holds one up."/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Was this your card? $1"/stopMusic/emote Vincent 40/pause 400/speak Vincent "I don't remember."/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Of course you don't... $2"/speak Vincent "That was fun, thank you miss!"/speed Vincent 3/move Vincent -12 0 1 true/pause 2000/advancedMove farmer false 0 -1/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Chrissy.Seanie "$q 6699 null "#You look at the card Chrissy was holding. You notice it was not his card, what do you say?#$r 66 0 event_MagicTruth#That’s not his card...#$r 6699 40 event_MagicLie#*lie* “Wow! You got it, that’s pretty cool."/playMusic springtown/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Let me try it again, I KNOW I’ll get it right this time. You don’t mind staying right?"/emote farmer 32/pause 500/end

Entries.1769802/f Chrissy.Seanie 1500: shaneTheme/6 7/farmer -100 -100 0 Lewis 5 5 1 Chrissy.Seanie 7 5 3/addConversationTopic Chrissy6HWait 0/skippable/pause 1500/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 4 11 0/speak Lewis "CJ, I’ve looked over this paperwork, THREE times now. $2#$b# Something isn’t adding up. $3"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Uncle Lew, I told you not to call me that anymore.$2"/speak Lewis "Sorry, Chrissy.$5#$b# But something isn’t adding up here.$2#$b# I thought you put all that behind you.$2"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "I did! I promise.$2"/speak Lewis "You said you were going to be taking this seriously. $4#$b# But it seems like you’re just back to your old ways."/speak Chrissy.Seanie "I’m not, I promise! $3#$b# Why can’t you trust me on this?"/speak Lewis "Do you know how risky it was for the MAYOR of Pelican Town to take in someone on the run from the feds? $3"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Oh, you LOVE to just throw that in my face Uncle Lew. $2#$b# What am I supposed to do? UNcommit tax fraud? $5"/speak Lewis "Well, you could at least take your job a bit more seriously. $3"/speak Chrissy.Seanie " I take it more seriously than you! $5#$b# You’re the one always taking 2 hour lunch breaks at the ranch!"/speak Lewis "What I do in my personal time is NONE of your concern! $3"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Well is it my concern that you’re a sad, old man, who won’t even commit to the one person in his life that cares about him? $7#$b# All for what? To be the mayor of some broken down town? $7#$b# The town is in shambles anyway.$7#$b# I heard that Pierre is thinking of moving his business to Grampleton."/speak Lewis "What? Is that true? $4"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "How would you know? You know nothing about your own town. $6#$b# You’re a fraud of a mayor."/faceDirection Lewis 3/pause 1000/speak Lewis "Maybe your tax evasion case isn’t the ONLY reason your family doesn’t talk to you anymore, CJ. $3"/move Lewis 0 6 2/speak Lewis "Sorry you had to see that, @. $2"/playSound doorClose/warp Lewis 1000 1000/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 2/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Would you just get out of here? $5#$b# This is none of your business."/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 200/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 1000 1000/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end warpOut

Entries.1769803/f Chrissy.Seanie 1500/A Chrissy6: continue/-10000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 2 Chrissy.Seanie 64 17 0/skippable/warp farmer -100 -100/viewport 64 15 clamp true/pause 2000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 64 15/pause 400/emote farmer 8/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Sorry you had to see that the other day $5#$b# My uncle was being so mean to me. $3#$b# Maybe I was a bit out of line too. $3#$b# I know I have a lot of explaining to do as your friend.$3#$b# If you can still consider me one. $3#$b# Just give me a little time. $1#$b# Welp, see you around!"/end

Entries.1769804/f Chrissy.Seanie 1500/n ChrissyM: continue/26 9/farmer 28 13 0 Chrissy.Seanie 25 9 1/skippable/pause 300/move farmer 0 -4 0/move farmer -2 0 3/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Hey @. $3#$b# Thanks for coming out today.$6"/stopMusic/speak Chrissy.Seanie "I just wanted the opportunity to explain everything to you. $3#$b# Because believe it or not, you might just be my best friend in the valley. $4"/playMusic desolate/speak Chrissy.Seanie "What you heard in my Uncle’s house the other day wasn’t a lie. $3#$b# I am on the run from the feds for tax evasion.$3#$b# You see the thing is... $3#$b# Tax evasion is actually really cool and based. $4#$b# I used to work for a prominent accounting firm in Zuzu City. $3#$b# And I realized if I just... didn’t pay my taxes...$3#$b# Then that would mean I would have more money. $1#$b# And if had more money, I could get more magic tricks. $7#$b# After that, I had to do the greatest magic trick of all...$3#$b# Vehicular Manslaughter."/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Just kidding, you knew what I meant. $7"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Now my whole family won’t talk to me. $3#$b# Except Uncle Lew. $3#$b# And I was awful to him."/stopMusic/speak Chrissy.Seanie "$q 6799 null "#How do I tell him I’m sorry @?#$r 67 50 event_LewisTalk#Just talk to him, I’m sure that he’ll understand.#$r 67 30 event_LewisSocks#Hide all his socks, until he runs out. Then he’ll ask you to go to the store to buy more. And you can bond on the trip.#$r 67 10 event_LewisScream#AHHHHHHHHHHHHH!"/playMusic sweet/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Even though Uncle Lew can be kind of a crumb sometimes, he’s actually really nice. $1#$b# He’s just stressed about the pressure of being the mayor. $0#$b# Which doesn’t really seem like a stressful job outside of picking up all of your wine. $7"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Thanks for talking to me today @. You really helped me out. $4#$b# I really owe you one. $1"/stopMusic/pause 1000/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Alright, if I don’t leave this forest right now, I’m going to crap my pants. $4#$b# Time to annihilate the nearest toilet! $7"/move Chrissy.Seanie 0 3 2/move Chrissy.Seanie 20 0 1 true/pause 3000/message "You also have the sudden urge to take a gigantic poop."/advancedMove farmer false 4 0 0 2 10 0/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Chrissy.Seanie "I apologized to my Uncle Lew. $0#$b# He apologized too. $1#$e# Turns out he was feeling awful about everything he said to me. $0#$b# That’s the nice thing about family, they’re always around. $1#$e# Or at least they’re supposed to be... $3"

Entries.1769805/f Chrissy.Seanie 2000/t 1300 190: continue/6 7/farmer -100 -100 0 Lewis 9 10 3 Chrissy.Seanie 7 10 1/addTemporaryActor PhoneTemp 16 32 8 10 2 false/skippable/pause 1500/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 4 11 0/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 3/emote Chrissy.Seanie 16/move farmer 0 -1 1/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Oh, @! I’m so glad you’re here! $1"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Today, me and Uncle Lew are going to call my family for the first time. $0#$b# I’m really nervous. $3"/speak Lewis "Oh Chrissy, don’t be nervous, you’ve got nothing to worry about. $1"/move farmer 0 -1 1/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 1 true/move farmer 4 0 2/stopMusic/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Alright, I’m dialing."/playSound phone/pause 800/message "Chrissy’s Mom: Hello? Lew?"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Hey Mom, it’s me! $11"/message "Chrissy’s Mom: Oh brother, why is that vapid hot dog calling?"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "YOU’RE ONE TO TALK YOU- $13"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Mom I’m calling to tell you, that I’m sorry. $12#$b# I’m sorry that I spent 10 years avoiding my taxes, brought a mockery onto our family, and made you all have to be employed by the road circus since you couldn’t get jobs anywhere else.$10"/message "Chrissy’s Mom: I do not forgive you."/speak Chrissy.Seanie "...Mom, I’m really sorry-$10"/message "Chrissy’s Mom: I will never forgive you Christmas Jade Bachelor."/emote Chrissy.Seanie 16 true/emote Lewis 16 true/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Mom, I asked you not to call me tha-$12"/message "Chrissy’s Mom: What does it matter what I call you? You’re a no good rat who did something completely unbased, and totally not cool! Tax evasion is NOT okay. In fact, everyone should always remember that Tax Day is on April 12th,"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "It’s on April 15th, Mom.$10"/message "Chrissy Mom: See! And you only know that because you never paid your taxes."/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Mom, I said I’m sorry! $12"/message "Chrissy’s Mom: I don’t care HOW sorry you are, you are not my daughter, and you never will be."/playMusic event1/speak Lewis "Shut the HECK up you dumb Street Clown! $4"/message "Chrissy’s Mom: What did you say to me, Lew?"/speak Lewis "You’re so cringe, and totally lame, and you can’t even Fortnite Royale! $4"/message "Chrissy’s Mom: You DARE speak to your sister like that?"/speak Lewis "You’re hardly my sister. Chrissy is more family than you ever have been. You’re totally undank, and you better hold this fat L. $5"/message "Chrissy’s Mom: You know I don’t understand Gen Z slang!"/speak Lewis "That’s why I said it. Ratio! $4"/stopMusic/message " Lewis hangs up the phone."/speak Lewis "Chrissy, I’m sorry... $2#$b# Are you okay? $2"/playMusic playful/speak Chrissy.Seanie "That was awesome, Uncle Lew! $7"/speak Lewis "Really? You’re not upset? $1"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "No, because that would probably require a long dialogue scene that the handsome mod creator probably doesn’t feel like writing. $1"/speak Lewis "Well, isn’t that just poggers! $1"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/message "Chrissy and Lewis start aggressively fortnite flossing."/message "I don’t feel like animating that though, so just trust me."/message "That happens."/end dialogue Chrissy.Seanie "Thanks for being there for my family call the other day. $3#$b# Even though I seemed okay at the time, I was pretty torn up afterwards. $3#$e# But I’m really happy that I have my new family in Uncle Lew. $1#$e# Maybe even an aunt too... $6"

Entries.1769806/f Chrissy.Seanie 2500/d Mon Wed: 50s/-1000 -1000/farmer 70 36 2 Chrissy.Seanie 71 45 0 Gus -100 -100 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite pennyFieldTrip/fade/viewport 70 45 true/move farmer 0 9 1/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 3/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Thanks for coming, @. $1#$b# You probably already know what this is about. $7"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "You know, me and you...alone in the woods...$6#$b# I- I just needed to find a way to show you how much I lo- $4"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "How much you mean to me. $4"/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 2 true/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 200/playSound pickUpItem/addObject 70 46 306/pause 600/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 3 true/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Chrissy.Seanie "So, for the first time ever, I’m letting someone who’s not my family participate in Mayonnaise Monday. $1#$b# Back when we were kids, we would do this every Monday. $1#$b# We didn’t have much money, since my mom was working as a street clown. $3"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "But one day, a giant mayonnaise truck jetted out of the street and fell on me. $3#$b# To keep us quiet, they gave us an unlimited supply of mayonnaise. $1#$b# Everyone else I’ve ever told about this has run away. $3#$b# I think that’s why I turned so cold to the world. $3"/quickQuestion I know it’s weird, but... you’ll eat it with me right?#Of course. You’re my everything. I’ll eat anything with you.#I’ll WATCH you eat a thousand jars of Mayonnaise. But I’m not eating that.#I don’t think this is going to work out.(break)switchEvent 10H_DrinkMayo(break)switchEvent 10H_MaybeDrink(break)switchEvent 10H_noMayo
Entries.10H_noMayo: stopMusic/friendship Chrissy.Seanie -501/speak Chrissy.Seanie "You’re just like everyone else. $5#$b# I think it’s best if you leave. $5"/move farmer 0 -10 0 true/pause 1000/faceDirection Chrissy 2/pause 400/showframe Chrissy 16/pause 400/animate Chrissy.Seanie false false 200 16 17 18 19 18 19 18 19 18/playSound gulp/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Mayonnaise Monday, Mayonnaise Monday! $8"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -500 -500/end
Entries.10H_DrinkMayo: pause 1/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Really? $1#$b# @, you’re just-$4"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Sometimes words just aren’t enough."/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Well, bottoms up!"/switchEvent 10H_Continue
Entries.10H_MaybeDrink: pause 1/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Oh. $3"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "That’s okay. $3"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "I just thought you might be the one. $3"/message "It looks like you don’t have a choice..."/switchEvent 10H_Continue
Entries.10H_Continue: faceDirection Chrissy 2 true/faceDirection farmer 2/playSound pickUpItem/removeObject 70 46 306/animate farmer false false 200 90 91 92 93 92 93 92/animate Chrissy.Seanie false false 200 16 17 18 19 18 19 18 19 18/playSound gulp/message "You nearly hurl at the thick texture going down your throat."/pause 200/showframe Chrissy.Seanie 0/showframe farmer 0/pause 200/playSound croak/animate farmer false false 350 104 105/message "You feel as though you might explode."/faceDirection farmer 2/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Ahh...It has that perfect egg tang."/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 3/faceDirection farmer 1/speak Chrissy.Seanie "I love you, @. $4#$b# You helped show me how wonderful the world can be $6#$b# And that tax evasion wasn’t cool and based. $7#$b# But it was me who was cool and based all along. $6"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "I still hate this stupid town. $1#$b# I hate how windy it is, I hate how talkative people are here, I hate that the shops are closed on random days, for no reason! $2#$b# But I love the family I’ve built here. $1#$b# And you’re part of that family too. $4"/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Now, lemme sniff your toes until your toenails fall off and they fly up my nostrils and then I need a doctor to surgically remove them. $7#$b# You probably think I’m joking around, but I’m not. $0#$b# I’m being dead serious. $0"/warp Gus 70 53 0/move Gus 0 -5 0/speak Gus "That’s just the way the cookie crumbles! $1"/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 2/speak Chrissy.Seanie "Oh, Gus, you’re such a jokester! $7"/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end

Entries.1769807/f Chrissy.Seanie 3500/n ChrissyM: playful/29 70/farmer 32 64 2 Chrissy.Seanie 29 67 2 Pam 26 70 0 Penny 27 70 0 Sam 28 70 0 Sebastian 29 70 0 Shane 25 70 0 Emily 29 71 0 Harvey 27 72 0 Maru 26 72 0 Leah 31 71 0 Elliott 30 71 0 Abigail 26 68 1 Caroline 26 67 1 Pierre 26 69 1 Gus 32 69 3 Lewis 32 68 3 Haley 24 69 1 Clint 28 72 0 Alex 30 72 0 George 31 72 0 Evelyn 32 72 0 Jas 30 70 0 Vincent 31 70 0 Jodi 28 71 0 Marnie 25 71 0 Robin 27 71 0 Demetrius 28 71 0 Willy 25 68 1/skippable/move farmer 0 3 3/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 1/speak Chrissy.Seanie "@! You’re here! $1#$b# Now the show can get started."/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 2/message "You proceed to watch Chrissy’s magic show. She starts off mean and nervous, but eventually she does a really good job."/message "The scene is awesome. Seriously. And in it you can tell that she’s working through the trauma of losing her family, and that she’s like finally happy."/message "Oh yeah, and then this guy comes."/addTemporaryActor LeahExMale 16 32 28 63 2 true/move LeahExMale 0 4 2/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 3/message "That’s Chrissy’s little brother. Remember? The one she was projecting onto in the 4 heart event with Vincent. Remember that?"/message " Well he comes and they make amends, and it like literally is this like tear jerking, awe inspiring scene."/message " It’s seriously beautiful, like I’m kind of getting choked up just typing these text boxes."/message "Anyway, yeah you watch it for a while and you’re like super emotional."/faceDirection Chrissy.Seanie 2/speak Chrissy.Seanie "This is probably the best day of my entire life. $1#$b# Thank you all for being here."/speak Lewis "I am so happy.$1"/speak Willy "And I’m Willy! $3"/speak Caroline "Just another average day in the valley. $5"/message "Everyone laughs, and a few even cry."/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
